name: Transparent Hands USA
mission: Conduct free life-saving surgeries/medical treatments for poor people all across Pakistan through its transparent crowdfunding online healthcare platform.
theoryOfChange: By using a transparent crowdfunding model, the organization connects global donors directly to verified patient cases to fund life-saving medical interventions that the local public health system or personal finances cannot cover.
zakatClaimEvidence: Transparent Hands is registered in the US, UK, and Pakistan. Pay your Zakat, donation at www.tranparenthands.org/ramadan-donation-plan/. Additionally, Transparent Hands allows users from all over the world to donate Zakat, Sadaqah, and other forms of donations to needy patients in Pakistan while ensuring complete transparency. (Source: https://transparenthands.org/basket-listing)

ui_signals_v1.recommendation_rationale: Good donor alignment with manageable risk. Evidence quality is solid but still evolving in places.

components.evidence: Accepts zakat (+2); Muslim-focused organization (+2); Asnaf: fuqara (+5); Operates in Muslim-majority regions (+3); Humanitarian service (+2)
components.name: Muslim Donor Fit

components.improvement_suggestion: Expand services to underserved populations or geographies with limited nonprofit coverage.
components.name: Underserved Space

alignment.rationale: Alignment 36/50: HIGH Muslim donor fit, humanitarian cause area

components.evidence: Beneficiary count appears implausible; CPB excluded pending review
components.improvement_suggestion: Publish beneficiary counts consistently so cost-effectiveness can be assessed.
components.name: Cost Per Beneficiary

components.improvement_suggestion: Build reserves toward your board-approved target range (often 3-12 months), adjusted for revenue volatility and obligations.
components.name: Financial Health

score_details.score_summary: Transparent Hands Foundation (US) INC shows strong alignment and moderate impact, with zakat compliance.

zakat.claim_evidence: Transparent Hands is registered in the US, UK, and Pakistan. Pay your Zakat, donation at www.tranparenthands.org/ramadan-donation-plan/. Additionally, Transparent Hands allows users from all over the world to donate Zakat, Sadaqah, and other forms of donations to needy patients in Pakistan while ensuring complete transparency. (Source: https://transparenthands.org/basket-listing)

all_citations.claim: The charity has a score of 89.75/100, a 72.0% program expense ratio, and 1.0 months of working capital.
The organization reported a total revenue of $584,685 and a fundraising efficiency of $0.23 per $1 raised.
The organization is Zakat-eligible and offers various donation options for medical procedures.
The foundation engages the community through volunteer opportunities and specific patient heart surgery appeals.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: The organization earns a 60/100 score due to its high alignment with humanitarian causes and transparent financial reporting, though its overall score is tempered by limited working capital reserves.
areas_for_improvement: Limited liquidity with only 1.0 months of working capital available
Moderate impact score reflecting the need for more comprehensive cost-per-beneficiary data

dimension_explanations.alignment: With an alignment score of 36/50, the foundation shows high donor fit for those seeking humanitarian causes and Zakat-eligible opportunities [3]. The organization addresses the urgent need for healthcare in Pakistan by connecting donors directly to patient cases through its platform [3][4].
dimension_explanations.impact: The charity demonstrates a direct service model by facilitating surgical and medical treatments, maintaining a program expense ratio of 72.0% [1][2]. While the organization is effective in delivering care, the impact score of 24/50 reflects a balanced view of its direct service delivery against a lack of specific cost-per-beneficiary metrics [1].

baseline_narrative.headline: Transparent Hands Foundation (US) INC provides life-saving surgical and medical treatments to underprivileged patients in Pakistan through a transparent crowdfunding platform.
strengths: High program expense ratio of 72.0%, ensuring the majority of funds go directly to medical services
Strong Charity Navigator score of 89.75/100 for financial health and accountability
Zakat-eligible status providing a verified giving channel for Muslim donors
baseline_narrative.summary: Transparent Hands Foundation (US) INC operates as a Zakat-eligible organization dedicated to funding free surgeries and medical procedures for those in need across Pakistan [1][3]. In the 2023 fiscal year, the charity reported a total revenue of $584,685 to support its mission of expanding healthcare access through partnerships with numerous hospitals [2].

rich_narrative.amal_score_rationale: The organization earns a 60/100 score due to its high alignment with humanitarian causes and transparent financial reporting, though its overall score is tempered by limited working capital reserves.

The charity has experienced a <cite id="[2]">3-year revenue CAGR of -11.9%</cite>, indicating a contraction in funding.
The organization operates with a <cite id="[2]">board size of 3</cite>, which is minimal for robust institutional oversight.

confidence.notes: Data confidence is high due to recent tax filings and third-party ratings.

alignment.improvement: Expand services to underserved populations or geographies with limited nonprofit coverage.

credibility.explanation: Donors can trust this organization due to its <cite id="[1]">overall score of 89.75/100</cite> from Charity Navigator and its Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid.
credibility.improvement: To strengthen credibility further, the charity could expand its <cite id="[2]">board size of 3</cite> to include more independent oversight.

impact.improvement: Publish beneficiary counts consistently so cost-effectiveness can be assessed, and build reserves toward a board-approved target range to improve the current <cite id="[1]">1.0 months of working capital</cite>.

grantmaking_profile.grant_strategy: Direct service delivery rather than grantmaking.

rich_narrative.headline: Transparent Hands Foundation (US) INC provides life-saving surgical and medical treatments to underprivileged patients in Pakistan through a transparent crowdfunding platform.

ideal_donor_profile.best_for_summary: Best for donors who want to directly fund individual medical procedures and surgeries for underprivileged patients in Pakistan.
donor_motivations: Want to fulfill Zakat obligations through direct medical aid
Prefer crowdfunding models where donations support specific patients
Care deeply about healthcare access in Pakistan
giving_considerations: The organization operates with very limited financial reserves
Revenue has contracted over the past three years
ideal_donor_profile.not_ideal_for: Donors seeking organizations with large financial safety nets or those focused on broad public health policy rather than individual treatments.

impact_evidence.evidence_grade_explanation: The organization tracks basic output metrics but lacks rigorous third-party impact evaluations.
impact_evidence.theory_of_change_summary: Funding individual surgeries directly improves the health and economic stability of underprivileged patients.
impact_evidence.why_evidence_matters: Evidence ensures that medical interventions are delivered safely and effectively to those most in need.

long_term_outlook.room_for_funding_explanation: The organization's limited reserves and recent revenue contraction suggest a high capacity to absorb additional funding for medical procedures.

peer_comparison.differentiator: Focuses specifically on crowdfunding individual medical procedures in Pakistan.

strengths.detail: The organization directs a significant portion of its funding to its mission, maintaining a <cite id="[2]">program expense ratio of 72.0%</cite>.
The charity has earned an <cite id="[1]">overall score of 89.75/100</cite> from Charity Navigator, indicating transparent operations.
The organization provides a <cite id="[3]">Zakat-eligible</cite> giving channel specifically supporting the fuqara and masakin.

strengths_deep_dive: Transparent Hands Foundation demonstrates a strong commitment to operational transparency and efficiency. The charity's <cite id="[2]">program expense ratio of 72.0%</cite> shows that the majority of donor contributions directly fund medical procedures. Furthermore, the organization operates with a <cite id="[1]">fundraising efficiency of $0.23 per $1 raised</cite>, indicating cost-effective resource mobilization. The charity also holds a Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid, reinforcing its commitment to public accountability.
rich_narrative.summary: Transparent Hands Foundation (US) INC is a <cite id="[3]">Zakat-eligible</cite> organization dedicated to funding <cite id="[3]">free surgeries and medical procedures</cite> for underprivileged patients in Pakistan. The organization operates a crowdfunding platform to connect donors directly with patients in need. In 2023, the charity reported <cite id="[2]">$584,685 in total revenue</cite> and maintained a <cite id="[2]">program expense ratio of 72.0%</cite>, ensuring the majority of funds support medical interventions. The organization holds an <cite id="[1]">overall score of 89.75/100</cite> from Charity Navigator, reflecting strong accountability practices, including <cite id="[1]">Culture and Leadership scores of 100</cite>. While the charity demonstrates a strong commitment to its mission, it operates with limited reserves, holding only <cite id="[1]">1.0 months of working capital</cite> in working capital.
